entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
